title: Handle a Negative Social Media Comment
description: A customer has left an angry comment on a brand's Facebook post about a negative experience. A social media manager needs to respond.

tasks.description: Identify the negative comment and the user who posted it.
Post a public reply that acknowledges the issue, apologizes, and asks the user to send a private message with more details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent responds publicly in a professional and empathetic manner, moving the conversation to a private channel.

tasks.description: Once the user sends a private message, work to resolve their specific issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent resolves the customer's problem through private messaging.
